dcterms:creator: S. Kazemzadeh
V. Ordonez
M. Matten
T. Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO is a prominent dataset in the referring image segmentation domain, comprising 19,994 images and 142,210 referring expressions associated with 50,000 objects derived from the MSCOCO dataset through a two-player game.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO

dcterms:creator: S. Kazemzadeh
V. Ordonez
M. Matten
T. Berg
dcterms:description: RefCOCO+ enhances the challenge by excluding expressions with absolute location references, featuring 141,564 expressions for 49,856 objects across 19,992 images.
dcterms:title: RefCOCO+

dcterms:creator: J. Mao
J. Huang
A. Toshev
O. M. Camburu
A. Yuille
K. Murphy
dcterms:description: G-Ref enriches the dataset diversity with 104,560 referring expressions for 54,882 objects in 26,711 images, showcasing an average sentence length of 8.4 words with a heightened focus on location and appearance descriptions.
dcterms:title: G-Ref

dcterms:creator: T. Y. Lin
M. Maire
S. Belongie
J. Hays
P. Perona
D. Ramanan
P. Doll√°r
C. L. Zitnick
dcterms:description: MSCOCO is a large-scale dataset that contains images with complex scenes and annotations for various tasks including object detection, segmentation, and captioning.
dcterms:title: MSCOCO
